column4: could anyone point me in the right direction on troubleshooting a kernel panic when i resume from hibernation?
i started a forum thread but haven't gotten any replies: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1141671
the ubu wiki page suggests i should file a bug, but i'm not convinced i actually have a bug. i think it's just my problem
what's the card? I bet the solution is simple
